title: Google\Cloud\Spanner\StructType
name: StructType
description: Represents a Struct Query Parameter type declaration.

params.name: fields
params.description: An array containing a field definition. Each field must be of form [(string|null) $name, (int) $type, (ArrayType|StructType|null) $child].

methods.name: add
methods.description:
Add a struct field definition.

Unnamed struct fields may be defined by providing null as the first argument value, however you may find it more convenient to use the provided Google\Cloud\Spanner\StructType::addUnnamed() method.

examples.caption: If a field is a struct or array, it must be explicitly defined.

params.name: type
params.description: $type A value type code or nested struct or array definition. Accepted integer values are defined as constants on Google\Cloud\Spanner\Database, and are as follows: Database::TYPE_BOOL, Database::TYPE_INT64, Database::TYPE_FLOAT64, Database::TYPE_TIMESTAMP, Database::TYPE_DATE, Database::TYPE_STRING and Database::TYPE_BYTES

exceptions.description: If an invalid type is provided.

returns.description: The current instance, for chaining additional field definitions.

methods.name: addUnnamed
methods.description: Add a struct field with no name.

params.name: type
params.description: $type A value type code or nested struct or array definition. Accepted integer values are defined as constants on Google\Cloud\Spanner\Database, and are as follows: Database::TYPE_BOOL, Database::TYPE_INT64, Database::TYPE_FLOAT64, Database::TYPE_TIMESTAMP, Database::TYPE_DATE, Database::TYPE_STRING and Database::TYPE_BYTES

exceptions.description: If an invalid type is provided.

returns.description: The current instance, for chaining additional field definitions.
